utility color class
Cross
The Cross class represents a game strategy where the goal is to have five tiles of the same type forming an X.
DeleteModelObserver
Represents an input message indicating an observer deletion request.
Diagonal
The Diagonal class represents a game strategy where the goal is to have five tiles of the same type forming a diagonal.
EdgesEightEquals
The EdgesEightEquals class represents a game strategy where the goal is to have either four tiles of the same type in the four corners of the bookshelf (strategyCode = 8) or at least eight tiles of the same type on the bookshelf (strategyCode = 9).

Represents a response message indicating an end game response notify.

Represents a response message indicating a finished inserting response.

Represents a response message indicating a forced ending response.
Game
The class contains information about the game state, including the board, players (with info on the currently playing one and the first one), chat, and common goals.

This class represents a message frame indicating that the game has been successfully created after selecting the number of players.

Class enum representing the gameState
Groups
The Groups class represents a game strategy where the goal is to have a certain number of groups of tiles on the bookshelf.
GuiManager
The GuiManager class handles the user interface interactions, manages the game state and the communication between client and server.

This class represents a custom message frame that notifies the user about a successful game load.

This class represents the launching menu of the game.
LobbyFullKillMessageFrame
This class represents a message frame indicating that joining the game lobby is not possible due to it being full.
Message
This class represent a single message object with a single sender, the payload of the message.

The MessageQueueHandler class is responsible for handling input messages from clients.

Triangle
The Triangle class represents a game strategy where the goal is to have columns on the bookshelf that either ascend or descend in height from left to right.

The UnselectableColumnException is an exception that is thrown when attempting to select an unselectable column.

The UnselectableTileException is an exception that is thrown when attempting to select an unselectable tile.

This class represents a message frame indicating that a tile is unselectable.

This class represents a message frame indicating that the player is waiting for more players to join the game.

Represents a response message indicating an invalid nickname response.
YouAreAloneMessage
This class represents a message frame indicating that the player is alone in the game and will win in 10 seconds.
